text: J. Jesikala, a head constable attached to Cantonment All Women Police Station, was robbed of her gold chain on Pachur road near Manachanallur on Monday. She was returning home in a two-wheeler when two unidentified culprits came close to her from behind in a motor-cycle and pushed her down. Armed with a knife, the duo threatened her and robbed the gold chain weighing six-and-half sovereigns and escaped. The police have registered a case .
title: Head Constable robbed of gold chain
